last_episode_to_air.name: More Than Just A Beauty And A Geek
last_episode_to_air.overview: The season finale begins with three teams but, in a surprising twist, the team that fares the worst in a pop quiz is sent home immediately. The two teams that know their partners best will continue to compete for $250,000 and a chance at becoming more than just a beauty and a geek. Jaws drop when the eliminated contestants return to the mansion for one final night and the claws come out during a blow-out fight over one geek's affection. Host Mike Richards reveals that there is nothing the final two teams can do to prepare for the final challenge.

name: Beauty and the Geek
overview: A group of "Beauties" and a group of "Geeks" are paired up to compete as couples for a shared $250,000 and other prizes. Each beauty lives together in a room with her geek during the course of the competition. There are challenges shown each episode, one testing the beauties on a primarily academic subject, and another that has the geeks competing in a more popular/social realm. The winners of the challenges select two teams to compete against each other in a pure "quiz show" type question and answer session: the team with fewer correct answers gets eliminated.

episodes.name: Meet the Geeks
episodes.overview: The ultimate social experiment begins when seven beauties and seven geeks move into an enormous mansion in Los Angeles.  After choosing teams, Brian explains the first challenge, where the women and the men must learn from each other to complete tasks.  All of the contestants must rediscover the fifth grade; the women compete in a trivia contest, focusing on history, spelling, and geography.  Meanwhile, the men learn dance moves from the women, who then must perform in front of a crowd of people, who judge who danced the best.   Mindi and Richard win both of their challenges, ensuring them full immunity and giving them the power to nominate two other teams for elimination.  At the elimination ceremony, Richard and Mindi send Eric and Cheryl and Joe and Erika to the elimination chamber, where Eric and Cheryl are eliminated.

episodes.name: A Day with Mechanics and Masseusses
episodes.overview: Episode two brings strain to the game. some of the Geeks are already growing thin on the Beauties, and one pair in the house, Erika and Brad, begins a romance.  The second set of tasks entails lots of oil the women must complete a series of tasks having to do with a car: popping the hood, and changing the oil, air filter, and a tire.  The men are forced to brush up on massages.  At the challenges, Chuck and Caitilin prosper, working as a team to win both.  Fighting breaks out between the two because of Chucks inability to nominate anyone for elimination, but in the end, they decide on sending Erika and Joe and Brad and Scarlet to the elimination room.  Erika and Joe lose the quiz, sending them home and ending the short-lived love between Erika and Brad.

episodes.name: Rockets and Fashion Shows
episodes.overview: The third set of tasks is one of the trickiest yet for both groups - the Beauties and the Geeks.  The women must brush up on their rocket science and follow a series of instructions in order to assemble a rocket and launch it in the fastest time.  Later, the men are taken to a series of stores in order to purchase three outfits - formal wear, swimsuit, and casual wear - for their partners to wear in a fashion show.  The winners of the tasks, Scarlet & Bill and Chuck & Caitilin, choose two teams to go up for elimination.  In the end, Krystal and Brad are sent home, both with tremendous boosts in confidence and skill level.

episodes.name: Makeovers and Pick-Up Lines
episodes.overview: The competition heats up as the four remaining teams gear up for their new tasks. The ladies get to give the guys makeovers and the guys must go out and get phone numbers from total strangers. Tensions rise as a rivalry grows between two of the contestants, and when Chuck and Caitilin win the challenges again, they nominate Richard & Mindi for elimination for the second time, along with Lauren & Bill.  The experience of having gone through elimination once already proves to be an advantage for Richard & Mindi, who survive, and Lauren & Bill are sent home.

episodes.name: The Great Outdoors
episodes.overview: For the first time, the individual couples must work together as a team to have a successful night of camping.  The rivalry between Chuck and Richard reaches an all-time high, and the romance between Scarlet and Chuck seems to fizzle out because of the competitive fire in Scarlet.  After a challenge in the wilderness, two of the teams are sent to the elimination room, where one team is sent home, leaving only two couples for the final task.

episodes.name: The Grand Prize Goes To...
episodes.overview: During the final day at the mansion, the teams spend more time getting to know each other, learning a skill that the other excels at - karate, cooking, kayaking, and piano - as one last thing to do with each other before the final elimination, a series of ten questions about your partner.  By evening's end, one team wins a quarter of a million dollars, but both teams walk away with more knowledge and more confidence.

episodes.name: Happily Ever After?
episodes.overview: Beauty and the Geek's first season contestants gather in front of a live studio audience to discuss their time in the house, as well as what they took away from the experience, how their confidence has increased, and how their rivalries and romances have ended after the show has wrapped production.

episodes.name: Casting Special
episodes.overview: Beauty and the Geek 2 begins with geekier Geeks, more beautiful Beauties, and lots of lessons learned, even in the first two days!  After the eight new women choose a partner, the contestants move into the mansion, and quickly begin to bond.  Josh finds himself filled with so much anxiety and insecurity that he cannot bear to sleep in his room with Cher but instead spends the night in the closet while Tristin reveals her own insecurities about wearing a swimsuit.

episodes.name: Episode 01
episodes.overview: Beauty and the Geek 2 begins with geekier Geeks, more beautiful Beauties, and lots of lessons learned, even in the first two days!  After the eight new women choose a partner, the contestants move into the mansion, and quickly begin to bond.  Josh finds himself filled with so much anxiety and insecurity that he cannot bear to sleep in his room with Cher but instead spends the night in the closet while Tristin reveals her own insecurities about wearing a swimsuit.

episodes.name: Episode 02
episodes.overview: The beauties and geeks continue with getting to know each other, but two couples are forced to meet more quickly than the rest when Chris and Amanda make their decision about which pair to switch themselves with. Later, the men face a karaoke challenge, and the women are forced to muster up the courage to give a speech about a political topic that they know very little about.

episodes.name: Episode 03
episodes.overview: The women educate the men about interior design and decorating for the next task, while the men teach the women the technological aspects of computers.  The women judge the geeks' newly-decorated rooms for the first task. After that, the beauties compete in a race to assemble a computer.

episodes.name: Episode 04
episodes.overview: When the women give the men makeovers in order to improve their chances of winning the week's only task, the geeks come out looking much more presentable than they did, and their confidence soars.  After the girls have stylists give the men haircuts, eyebrow and chest waxings, and find a new wardrobe, the guys are sent to a bar for a round of speed dating, where three women spend a short period of time with all six men and then judge them on their conversation, appearance, and all-around social skills.  The women observe the dates and critique their partners from TV monitors.

episodes.name: Episode 05
episodes.overview: The group travels to Las Vegas and plays strip poker, an infatuation develops between two contestants, and a couple is eliminated.

episodes.name: Episode 06
episodes.overview: The beauties are forced to ask their geeks out on a romantic date, and later, the men set out on a photography challenge, making their partners feel comfortable as the subjects of their work.  The relationship between Cher and Wes becomes more intimate, and at the end of the episode, one couple is sent packing.

episodes.name: Episode 07
episodes.overview: The contestants make heartfelt videos for their partner, explaining what the partner means to them and what they learned from the experience of Beauty and the Geek.  After the teams cherish their videos, they get to work on the next task, a joint scavenger hunt.  The challenge involves each couple in thier own car with a driver; the women (without any help from the men) must navigate through Los Angeles to three different stores, where the men must then go into the store and choose the item that they think their partner has picked.

episodes.name: Episode 08 - The Finale
episodes.overview: The two remaining couples are given some time to spend with each other and learn some of their hobbies.  Josh takes Cher fly fishing while Joe shows Brittany his chess skills and tries to teach her the game. Later, Cher teaches Josh how to cook a meal as Brittany takes Joe ice-skating.  After, the teams spend their last hours with each other, studying the ins and outs of each of their lives for the final quiz.  In the quiz room, the pairs are surprised to learn that instead of the way the final quiz was orchestrated in season one, this one would be different: one person from each pair must answer a series of questions about his or her own interests and the other must try to match the answers.

episodes.name: The Beauties Meet the Geeks, Part 1
episodes.overview: The third season again unites a group of "beauties" with a gang of "geeks" for hilarious and heart-rendering results, and a prize of $250,000 to the winners.

episodes.name: The Beauties Meet the Geeks, Part 2
episodes.overview: The beauties must conduct an interview with an author while the geeks must perform stand-up comedy at the Laugh Factory. One team is eliminated at the end of the episode.

episodes.name: Geeks Get Naked
episodes.overview: The beauties act as tour guides to visitors of the California Science Center museum while the geeks are required to draw sketches of a naked woman. One team is eliminated at the end of the episode.

episodes.name: Beauties Pimp Their Geeks
episodes.overview: The geeks are given makeovers and later offered up as bids at a live charity auction hosted by the beauties. One team is eliminated at the end of the episode.

episodes.name: Beauties and the Beach
episodes.overview: The five remaining teams take a surprise trip to San Diego's Mission Beach, where the beauties must learn about radio waves and electronics while the geeks must put together their own fitness routines. One team is eliminated at the end of the episode.

episodes.name: Geek Love
episodes.overview: The four remaining teams each get a dog; the geeks must get women's phone numbers at a dog park.

episodes.name: Down on the Farm
episodes.overview: The final three teams get down and dirty at a farm where they must work with animals. Two teams face elimination, one team is eliminated, and the final two teams are revealed.

episodes.name: Beauty Queen and Geek King
episodes.overview: In the shocking third season finale, unexpected visitors threaten to jeopardize the status of the competition. Meanwhile, as the final two teams prepare for the final showdown, they reveal sides of each other that they've never shown before, and one teammate makes a decision that turns the competition upside down and leaves everyone in shock.

episodes.name: Beauties and Geeks Reunite
episodes.overview: In this special reunion episode, the beauties and the geeks are reunited in New York, where they reminisce about their good and bad times in the competition, new never-before-seen footage is revealed, and updates on the lives of the contestants are shared.

episodes.name: When Worlds Collide, Part 1
episodes.overview: In part one of the fourth season premiere, host Mike Richards is joined by season three's Nate and Jennylee on a nationwide search for the new season's beauties and geeks.

episodes.name: When Worlds Collide, Part 2
episodes.overview: In part two of the fourth season premiere, the twenty chosen contestants soon realize that they are in for a very unique season as the new cast includes a male beauty and a female geek. Afterwards, the finalists pair up during a barbecue and get to meet their new partners.

episodes.name: Opposites Attract
episodes.overview: Things are shaken up when the male beauty and the female geek finally move into the mansion. Meanwhile, the geeks are challenged to write an autobiographical rap to be performed for Three 6 Mafia, and the beauties must study politics and later put their newfound knowledge to the test while debating each other.

episodes.name: Double Dare
episodes.overview: After a champagne celebration and a game of Truth or Dare take place, a romance begins to happen in the house between two contestants. Meanwhile, the beauties must study anatomy, and are later challenged by locating and drawing organs on their partner's body. The geeks, on the other hand, are challenged to put together romantic gifts.

episodes.name: It's Not Rocket Science
episodes.overview: The house romance takes a turn that could ruin one of the teams. Meanwhile, as voted by viewers, the geeks are challenged to massage the ladies while the beauties are challenged with rocket science.

episodes.name: It's Good to Be King
episodes.overview: It's makeover time! The geeks get their new looks and later put them to the test in the Beauty and the Geek prom, where one of them is named king. Meanwhile, the beauties are required to teach a third-grade class.

episodes.name: Super Geek
episodes.overview: The geeks must create superheroes and design their own costumes. The beauties, meanwhile, are required to provide the back story for their partner's super creation.

episodes.name: A Look Back
episodes.overview: With only five weeks until the season finale, the show is taking viewers back to the special moments of season four and also treating its audience to never-before-seen footage of the contestants.

episodes.name: Viva Mexico!
episodes.overview: The remaining contestants travel to Mexico, where one geek comes out of his shell and another is pushed to limits. For their challenges, the beauties must face each other in a memory competition while the geeks compete for immunity in a dance-off. Finally, a new twist promises to turn the competition upside down.

episodes.name: Raising the Bar
episodes.overview: It's down to the final four teams, and tension and second guessing begin to take over the mansion. For their challenges, the beauties must get personal with creepy crawlers and the geeks must battle it off at a bar tending challenge that will test their confidence.

episodes.name: Whine and Dine
episodes.overview: The three remaining teams go to a vineyard for a wine-making challenge.

episodes.name: Meet the Parents
episodes.overview: The final two teams go to each other's hometowns and meet each other's parents. Later, the contestants are shocked to discover that a major twist has the final showdown be something completely unexpected.

episodes.name: And the Winner Is...
episodes.overview: In the fourth season finale, all ten teams are reunited for one last time. At the end of the encounter, the winning team is revealed.

episodes.name: Season Premiere
episodes.overview: The nine new beauties arrive via Air Beauty and nine new geeks arrive via the Geek Mobile. Everyone is surprised to learn they will compete as teams of beauties vs. teams of geeks. Upon moving into the mansion and getting used to their new surroundings, the beauties are required to shed their make-up and high heels and are given a complete make-under. Once prosthetic noses and oversize sweaters are added, the girls must put their social skills to the test by trying to secure phone numbers from unsuspecting guys at a bar. The geeks find themselves in the brand new quiz room where one geek is sent home.

episodes.name: Raps, Rhymes and Geeks
episodes.overview: With the competition well under way, everyone must showcase their talents when instructed to perform in a beauty vs. geek talent show. Flirtations between several beauties and geeks cause some startling consequences. Fearful of losing her spot in the house, one beauty is willing to do whatever it takes to stick around, but rocks the boat when she frustrates both teams.

episodes.name: It's Game Time
episodes.overview: When the beauties face off against the geeks in a game of flag football, the action on the field becomes highly aggressive. One player gets injured while another suffers a different kind of fate. Back at the mansion, the social experiment takes another serious turn.

episodes.name: Lovelorn Science
episodes.overview: Newly formed geeks and beauty duos try combining skills when their first team challenges are revealed. The social experiment takes a technical turn when the beauties must present a homemade science project to some discerning critics. Some geeks become smooth operators when offering relationship advice to live callers on Dr. Drew's nationally syndicated radio program, "Loveline." One unlucky pair doesn't make the grade and leaves the house.

episodes.name: From Geek to Chic
episodes.overview: The highly anticipated geek makeover has arrived and the remaining guys shock the beauties with their new looks. The teams turn up the heat on the set of the Emmy Award-winning daytime drama "The Young and the Restless," as cast members Michelle Stafford and Joshua Morrow appear to judge the teams on their acting chops. A twist at the stair ceremony lets one team off the hook but leaves the remaining teams in the lurch.

episodes.name: Flame Broiled Geeks
episodes.overview: When a practical joke falls flat, a geek loses his cool with one of the beauties. Flames ignite when the geeks must become firefighters and rescue their beauties from a burning building. The beauties get a whiff of a smelly challenge involving two of their least favorite things.

episodes.name: Beauty and the Geek Special
episodes.overview: This special highlights the biggest, sexiest and most dramatic moments from the first six episodes of the season. The show will also feature an astounding surprise makeover for one eliminated geek, filmed exclusively for this special. Plus, profiles of this year's most colorful characters, never-before-seen footage in the mansion, unseen moments from casting tapes and the inside scoop on all the clicks, clashes, catfights, and love connections.

episodes.name: Snowbound
episodes.overview: The beauties and geeks don their galoshes for a quick getaway to Big Bear Mountain in California. A sled-building challenge paves the way for a bumpy ride as several teams try to make their way down the mountain. A geek's innocent crush on his partner blows up in his face, causing a hostile barrier to grow between them.

episodes.name: The Fixer-Uppers
episodes.overview: After hashing out their differences in Big Bear, one team returns to the mansion and announces to the other teams that they are a force to be reckoned with. Geeks become style gurus when they give head-to-toe makeovers to a group of nerdy girls for this week's challenge. The beauties roll up their sleeves and are tested on their plumbing skills.

episodes.name: More Than Just A Beauty And A Geek
episodes.overview: The season finale begins with three teams but, in a surprising twist, the team that fares the worst in a pop quiz is sent home immediately. The two teams that know their partners best will continue to compete for $250,000 and a chance at becoming more than just a beauty and a geek. Jaws drop when the eliminated contestants return to the mansion for one final night and the claws come out during a blow-out fight over one geek's affection. Host Mike Richards reveals that there is nothing the final two teams can do to prepare for the final challenge.
